content:
Hi I have put together a draft PR to get some design feedback for search by url parts.

You can run it locally or quickly see screenshots.
Link to PR: https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/22192

Some known trade offs from current technical solution:

  • while searching if search term have . / ? # and @ in it those are not highlighted or matched in links of messages returned (See screenshot where searching emoji.html in https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/22192)

Side Note: the technical implementation of this PR still might have some unacounted edge cases. The above tradeoff is due to choosing a technical solution that do not require superuser permission of DB so this feature can be used by more users with no DB superuser access
